title: SMC_RecomputeABCSlopes (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_RecomputeABCSlopes
Recomputes the slopes of the additional axes A,B,C so that a smooth movement results.
The slope at the end of elemnt i is set as
(AddAxisValue(i+1) - AddAxisValue(i-1)) /  (ElementLength(i) + ElementLength(i+1)).
At a stop, the slope is either set to zero, or set so that the interpolation of
the additional axis is linear, depending on the input
modeAtStop
.

rows: The buffer for the output queue

The angle tolerence (in angular degrees) to detect stops
between elements

Determines how the slope is set at element transitions without
a stop.  The default is SET_SMOOTH_CARDINAL.

Determines how the slope is set at element transitions with
a stop.  The default, due to compatibility with older versions,
is SET_ZERO.
